<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Greater Bloodline](/Feats.aspx?ID=6108) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=824" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 154 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
bloodline spell

</column>

---

You uncover the greater secrets of your bloodline. You gain the greater bloodline spell associated with your bloodline.
name: Greater Bloodline
